statements: SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM quality_metrics WHERE readmission_rate > 0.1
SELECT admission_date, discharge_date FROM quality_metrics WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE readmission_rate < 0.05
SELECT patient_id, readmission_rate FROM quality_metrics WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE readmission_rate > 0.1;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM quality_metrics WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND admission_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, discharge_date, readmission_rate FROM quality_metrics WHERE readmission_rate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY readmission_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE admission_date < discharge_date;
SELECT MAX(readmission_rate) AS max_readmission_rate, MIN(readmission_rate) AS min_readmission_rate FROM quality_metrics;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT MAX(readmission_rate) AS max_readmission_rate FROM ReadmissionRates;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT hospital_id, hospital_name, location FROM Hospital ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, location, readmission_rate FROM Hospital h JOIN ReadmissionRates r ON h.hospital_id = r.hospital_id WHERE readmission_rate > 5.0;
SELECT hospital_name, location, readmission_rate FROM Hospital h LEFT JOIN ReadmissionRates r ON h.hospital_id = r.hospital_id WHERE location LIKE '%New%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_hospitals, AVG(readmission_rate) AS avg_readmission_rate FROM ReadmissionRates;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE bed_count > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT hospital_name, bed_count FROM Hospital ORDER BY bed_count DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patient JOIN Readmission ON Patient.patient_id = Readmission.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name
SELECT hospital_name, location, bed_count FROM Hospital WHERE bed_count < 100 ORDER BY bed_count ASC, hospital_name
SELECT * FROM Readmission WHERE reason LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY readmission_date DESC, reason
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM Metrics GROUP BY metric_type

SELECT p.patient_name, h.hospital_name, r.readmission_date FROM Patient p INNER JOIN Readmission r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id INNER JOIN Hospital h ON r.hospital_id = h.hospital_id ORDER BY r.readmission_date DESC, p.patient_name
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM Hospitals;
SELECT hospital_name, city FROM Hospitals WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT admission_date, discharge_date FROM Admissions WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY admission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT hospital_name, city FROM Hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN Hospitals ON Patients.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, hospital_name FROM Patients JOIN Hospitals ON Patients.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, r.readmission_reason FROM Patients p JOIN ReadmissionRates r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.readmission_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospitals ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT bed_count, name FROM Hospitals WHERE bed_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE bed_count > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Patients.name, Admissions.diagnosis, Admissions.treatment FROM Patients JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id WHERE Admissions.discharge_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Hospitals.name, AVG(Metrics.readmission_rate) AS avg_readmission_rate FROM Hospitals JOIN Metrics ON Hospitals.hospital_id = Metrics.hospital_id GROUP BY Hospitals.name HAVING avg_readmission_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY avg_readmission_rate ASC;

SELECT Patients.name, Admissions.admission_date, Readmissions.readmission_date, Readmissions.cause FROM Patients JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female' AND Readmissions.cause = 'Infection';
